paper_abstract: We describe a case-study of the application of web-technology (Helm [2]) to create web-based didactic material out of a repository of formal mathematics (C-CoRN [5]), using the structure of an existing course (IDA [4]). The paper discusses the difficulties related to associating notation to a formula, the embedding of formal notions into a document (the "view"), and the rendering of proofs.
paper_title: An interactive algebra course with formalised proofs and definitions
